articles.title: Xiaomi launches Mi Band 6 with a full screen AMOLED display launched: Price, specifications - India Today
articles.description: The Mi Band 6 was unveiled in China on Monday evening and succeeds last year’s Mi Band 5. The new fitness band is claimed to come with a ‘full screen’ AMOLED display.
